name: Geometry to LaTeX Converter
description: An intelligent agent that analyzes geometric figures from images and generates corresponding LaTeX code using the TikZ library. It employs a two-step AI pipeline: first, Gemini Pro performs a vision-based analysis to extract detailed geometric data (vertices, lines, annotations) from the image. Then, Gemini Flash uses this structured data to generate a complete, well-formatted, and compilable LaTeX document.
